text: 6|73|vanankalaiyum, pumiyaiyum pataittavan unmaiyakave avantan. (Avan etaiyum pataikkak karutumpotu) â€˜akuka!' Ena avan kuruvatutan (tamatam.) Utane (atu) akivitum.Avanutaiya coltan unmai cur (ekkalam) utappatum nalil atikaram avan oruvanutaiyatakave irukkum. Maraivanavarraiyum velippataiyanavarraiyum avan nankarivan. Avan nanamutaiyavanakavum (anaittaiyum) nankarintavanakavum irukkiran
